main: ^It is celebrated every second week of April. An annual event which takes place in Masbate, Philippines that showcases skills in livestock handling, such as lassoing, wrestling, and riding cattle. Also included in the event are a fair and exhibitions and trade of cattle and horses.

c-0: ^It is traditionally considered the “Cattle Country of the Philippines.” The highlight of the event is the rodeo competition itself. Men and women dress up in cowboy outfits to perform stunts.
